title: Rambo Issues 1985
brief_description: A current affairs style program, with panel members - including Phillip Adams and Max Teichman - discussing the political and moral implications of the film “Rambo”. Excerpts from Rambo are discussed alongside recorded interviews with a Vietnam veteran and a representative from a South American refugee organisation.
